about_the_game:
This is a high difficulty action game with compact battles and immersive atmosphere. The main weapon is a bow, and can also launch kick attacks. Player need to adopt different combat strategies based on different NPCs and the features of the scene. The game encourages players to attack and is worth repeatedly challenging. The game has multiple unique levels, and as you complete the relevant levels, new level will be unlocked.

Game Features:

  • High difficulty, requires a one-life clear.

  • A female character who is both powerful and vulnerable, demanding superior combat skills.

  • NPCs that can kill with a single strike, and bosses that will drive you insane.

  • Unique level design, atmospheric, with a constant sense of pressure.

  • Requires observation and utilization of NPC characteristics, as well as scene features, to counter-kill NPCs.

The game is still in production, and a demo is available for download!

Originally, I intended to use Unreal Engine's free assets to create a game prototype and then develop a game development course. However, as production progressed, I increasingly felt the limitations of free assets and began incorporating some paid assets into the creation. Things got a bit out of hand, so I decided to make a full-fledged game. More content will be continuously added, and more paid assets will be used. Starting production in November 2024, it's been just a few months of solo development, and I hope you all enjoy it!

For those interested in this game and game development, welcome to follow my youtube channel:@VeryBigFireball

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400, AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB), AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-13700K, AMD Ryzen 7 7800X3D
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070, AMD Radeon RX 7800 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
